name: Colin Bucksey
info:
• 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1946
  • 出生地: Camberwell, London, England
  • 配偶: Verity Lambert (m. 1973; div. 1987) Sally Bucksey (m. 1988)
detail: Colin Bucksey (born 1946 in Camberwell, London, England) is a British-born American film and television director.
